reviews.review: Mesmo sendo um jogo antigo, ainda vale a pena tê-lo na sua biblioteca do Steam.
Só não é perfeito porque a Valve n conta até 3, porém vai vir o Half Life: Alyx <3 estou ansioso pra "zerar" no youtube, já que não tenho como jogar em vr '-'
This game is Half Life 2. It has been out long enough that you should have an opinion on it already. I just wanted to get rid of the "Would you recommend this game?" bar.
弗地冈人当场侮辱弗里曼，说弗里曼是靠艾利克斯才红的。弗里曼当场气哭，艾利克斯跟弗地冈人打赌，如果这条消息被99万17号城市的居民转发，那么弗地冈人就当场下跪给弗里曼道歉，而且g胖还会出《半条命3》来赔罪。看到就转，不转不是city17的人。
So, wake up, Mr. Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes.
Its one of the greatest games ever.
Крутая игра не смотря на простую графику
It's Half Life 2. Why would you not play it?
Good gameplay and puzzles, great exploration and set pieces, all tied together with a wonderful story and world. A game that you should experience ASAP.
Классика, одна из лучших игр, которую можно проходить снова и снова!

Overrated. The game is essentially a showcase of what the Source engine can do. The game really doesn't deserve all the praise it gets. The best part is, that this game doesn't actually have an ending.
Ну как бы классика, что говорить то
Valve 3 e Kadar Saymayı Öğrense İyi Olur Şimdiden.

Half Life 2 is possibly one of the most innovative first person shooters ever made. 
Everything from it's predecessor has been thoughtfully upgraded for player enjoyment and world building.
While it may seem dated by 2019 standards, One must keep in mind that HL2 released in 2004. Many of the games set pieces still look as good now as they did 15 years ago. 

Half Life 2 also has one of the largest mod communities I have ever interacted with. There are many mods that have only recently been released that completely change how the player tackles the game. 
Some examples:
MMod
Garry's mod
Black mesa
The Stanley Parable
HL2 Cinematic Mod (If you ignore the character editor)

In all I would recommend Half life 2 to anyone who wants a game with an intricate universe that still harbors questions 15 years later
Co można powiedzieć , gra jest bardzo dobra tylko potrzeba kontynułacji z strony twórców. Grę polecam bardzo ciepło pomimo lat które już ma to do dziś wydaje się bardzo dobrą grą
Мне понравилось что можно стрелять в жуков
A 2004 game still holds up pretty good.

Checks out to be a revolutionary game and hasn't aged a bit. Worth every second of gameplay.
10/10, эта игра оправдывает все свои оценки.

Absolute classic of a Game on Steam. Every proud owner of a steam account should have this game.
Valve should be commended for making such a great game. Half-Life Alyx coming out soon is fulfilling on many levels. Making a good game that lives up to other media is a difficult task.

A great sequel to a great game. This game has some of the best physics of all time. The graphics still hold up well in my opinion and the story is great as well. My favorite additions to the game are the previously mentioned physics, the gravity gun, more fleshed out characters, and the diverse locations. A definite must play for any gamer.

I can confidently say that Half Life 2 is my all time favorite game. It's the perfect balance between First Person Shooter, Puzzle, and Story. Some of the weapons you use are also key parts of puzzles during the game, such as grenades or the Gravity Gun. There are challenging parts, but that further increases the thrill of this game. I absolutely, 100 % reccomend this game to everyone. Even if they're not into this sort of thing, I still tell them to play this game.
HL2 - no comment needed - play it.
This game is an absolute masterpiece
awesome, half life alyx came out and still one of the best games ever
this game has a pretty cool story. also its fun

first game i played on PC back in 2009, atmosphere is amazing and the soundtrack fits this game perfectly, I cant recommend this game more, it was a huge part of my childhood and still is my favorite game.

-Döneminde çağ atlamış grafikler ve oynanış motorları
-Güzel ve sürükleyici bir atmosfer ve hikaye
-Bir adam düşünün half life serisi boyunca tek bir kelime bile etmemiş görüntüsü oyunda yer almamış bir karakterin efsane olabileceğini düşünün ama çok düşünmeye gerek yok çünkü o Gordon Freeman! asla yaşlanmayacak bir karakter.
-Yan karakter Alyx de bir okadar kaliteli bir kadın karakter oyun boyunca bize rehberlik ediyor ve oyundaki etkiside büyük.
-Bu oyunu 2020 2030 olsun hiç farketmez yinede oynayabilirsiniz çünkü grafikler 2004 yapımı bir oyun için çok ileride bir grafik
-Source motorunun atası bu oyundur günümüzde oynadığımız oyunların hepsi half life oyun motorundan yararlandı.
Çok birşey demeye gerek yok asla yaşlanmayacak bir başyapıt.
(10/10)
i have 14 hours and STILL have beaten it, and idk if thats because im really bad at video games but i like to tell myself that it has alot of sustinance and thats why. play it!!!
